title: Ayurvedic Face Serum — Amla & Rosehip
excerpt: Antioxidant-rich night serum blending rosehip oil and amla infusion to brighten, support collagen, and balance Pitta-prone skin.
content:
## What Is This Amla & Rosehip Face Serum?
A lightweight, antioxidant serum combining cold-pressed rosehip oil with an amla oil infusion and vitamin E to support skin brightening, collagen support, and Pitta balance.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Amla brings cooling Rasayana support and antioxidant protection; rosehip provides essential fatty acids and supports skin regeneration. Together they nourish tissues and promote a radiant complexion.

### Key Benefits
- Brightens complexion and supports skin repair.
- Rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidants.
- Lightweight enough for nightly layering in a routine.

## Ingredients
- Cold-pressed rosehip oil
- Amla-infused oil
- Vitamin E (natural tocopherol)

## Usage Instructions
- Apply 2–3 drops nightly to cleansed face and neck; massage gently upward.
- Can be layered under a moisturizer if desired.

## Packaging
- Amber dropper bottle (glass) to protect oil potency.

## Storage
- Store in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch test before first use. Those with very oily or acne-prone skin should introduce gradually or consult a dermatologist.

## Why Choose This Serum?
A carefully balanced Ayurvedic serum that combines traditional antioxidant herbs with modern carrier oils for nightly rejuvenation and glow.
